lead_paragraph: Because of an editing error, an article on Aug. 25 about the announcement that the filly Rachel Alexandra would face older male horses in the Woodward Stakes this Saturday at Saratoga misstated the size of the purse for the race before it was raised to $750,000. It was $500,000, not $250,000.
